flawed_nl_solution:
Henry and Paul collected a total of 11+24 = <<11+24=35>>35 seashells
To make a total of 59, Leo must have collected 59-35 = <<59-35=26>>26 seashells
He gave out a quarter of 26 seashells which is 26*(1/4) = <<26*(1/4)=13/2>>13/2 seashells
They are now left with 59-13/2 = <<59-13/2=105/2>>105/2 seashells

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 24, not 26. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
